## SubscriptionSnapshot interface

Represents the current state of a set of subscriptions owned by a user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SubscriptionSnapshot 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [changes](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscriptionsnapshot.changes.md) | Array&lt;{ type: [SubscriptionChangeType](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscriptionchangetype.md)<!-- -->; subscription: [Subscription](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscription.md)<!-- -->; }&gt; | The list of changes in the subscriptions since the last snapshot. |
|  [empty](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscriptionsnapshot.empty.md) | boolean | True if there are no subscriptions available. False whenever at least one subscription is present. When True, the <code>subscriptions</code> array is empty, and the <code>size</code> is 0. |
|  [size](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscriptionsnapshot.size.md) | number | Number of currently available subscriptions. This is same as the length of the <code>subscriptions</code> array in the snapshot. |
|  [subscriptions](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscriptionsnapshot.subscriptions.md) | [Subscription](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscription.md)<!-- -->\[\] | A list of all currently available subscriptions ordered by the subscription ID. Empty if no subscriptions are available. |
